wishlists.no_wishlists: You don't have any wishlists yet.

hero.subtitle: Transform how you share wishes with the people who matter most. Create beautiful wishlists, share them effortlessly, and eliminate the guesswork from every celebration.

features.title: Built for Modern Gift-Givers
features.subtitle: Powerful features wrapped in an intuitive experience
features.organize_desc: Create unlimited wishlists tailored to every occasion—birthdays, weddings, holidays, or just because. Keep your wishes organized and always within reach.
features.share_desc: No hoops to jump through. Your friends and family view your wishlist instantly—no signups, no downloads, no hassle. Just click and browse.
features.duplicates_desc: Your cousin reserves the sweater. Your best friend sees it's taken and picks something else. Coordination happens automatically—no awkward group chats required.
features.control_desc: Create separate lists for different circles. Wedding registry for everyone, pricey items for close family only. Revoke access anytime. Your wishlists, your rules.
features.context_desc: Go beyond simple lists. Attach product images, prices, purchase links, and personal notes to give gift-givers all the context they need.
features.scale_desc: Whether you're planning a family gift exchange or coordinating with a large friend group, Wishlist adapts to your needs seamlessly.

how_it_works.title: Your Perfect Wishlist in Minutes
how_it_works.subtitle: Three simple steps to better gift-giving
how_it_works.step1_desc: Authenticate with Google in one click. We respect your data and never ask for more than necessary.
how_it_works.step2_desc: Add items with rich details—images, prices, links, and notes. Make it easy for loved ones to nail the perfect gift.
how_it_works.step3_desc: Send your wishlist link and let the magic happen. Watch as gifts get reserved and surprises come to life.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Gift-Giving?
cta.subtitle: Join hundreds of users who've already discovered a better way to celebrate. Free to start, easy to love.
